<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

                    </li>
                
                        </ul>
</div>
    </div>

<script type="text/template" id="market-result-tpl">
  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>
    <div class="fail-wrap">
      <div class="fail-title"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.title %></div>
      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>
            <div class="coupon-value"><%= marketResult.styleContent.discountValue + marketResult.styleContent.unit %></div>
          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <div class="expire-date"><%= '有效期：' + marketResult.styleContent.startTime + '~' + marketResult.styleContent.endTime %></div>
        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">


    function isTestEnv() {
        return ("" + window.location.host).indexOf("anjuke.test") >= 0;
    }
    var gLogin = new XF.Login({
        loginST: '#j-site-login',
        pathUrl : "/ajax/checkMenu/",
        baseUrl: isTestEnv() ? '//user.anjuke.test' : '//user.anjuke.com'
    });

    var is_58_pc = false;
    var XF_Search = new XF.Search({
        searchST  : '#j-search',
        formST    : '.search-form',
        inputST   : '.input-search',
        listST    : '.search-autocomplete',
        searchBtn  : '#search-btn',
        hoverClass: 'hover',
        initVal   : '请输入楼盘名或地址',
        url       : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/autocomplete/',
        brand_url : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/brand/',

        c         : 115,
        n         : 8,
        p         : '',//shangzhu , shangpu , xiezilou

        is58PC    : is_58_pc,
        is_commercial : 0,
        soj:'{"click_input":"{from:search_box_click}"}',
        has_rent: '0'
    });

    var XF_HotSearch = new XF.HotSearch({
        gSearch  : XF_Search,
        hSearchST: '#j-hot-search',
        hoverClass: 'current',
    });

    (function($) {
        var base64CurrentUrl = "aHR0cDovL255LmZhbmcuYW5qdWtlLmNvbS9sb3VwYW4vYWxsL3AxLw==";
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var href;
            if (base64CurrentUrl) {
                $("body").on("click.logout", "a", function(e) {
                    var elm = $(this);
                    if (elm.html() == "退出" && (href = elm.attr("href"))) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        window.location.href = href + (href.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?") + "history=" + base64CurrentUrl;
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    })(jQuery);

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

    <!-- 因为逻辑不变
        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤
        原始皮肤为 topicactive01 对应 安居客赢了网
        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节
    -->

  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>

      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>

          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>

        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

                });

    SPA_HASH: false, //单页应用必选
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤
        原始皮肤为 topicactive01 对应 安居客赢了网
        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节

<script type="text/template" id="market-result-tpl">
  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>
    <div class="fail-wrap">
      <div class="fail-title"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.title %></div>
      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>
            <div class="coupon-value"><%= marketResult.styleContent.discountValue + marketResult.styleContent.unit %></div>
          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <div class="expire-date"><%= '有效期：' + marketResult.styleContent.startTime + '~' + marketResult.styleContent.endTime %></div>
        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

    
    <!-- 统一登录弹层 -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="//pages.anjukestatic.com/xinfang/js/jquery-1.9.1/jquery-underscore.min.js"></script>


<script type="text/javascript" crossorigin src="https://include.anjukestatic.com/aifang/res/438350/b/Aifang_Web_Loupan_Listv4_ListIndex.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">


    function isTestEnv() {
        return ("" + window.location.host).indexOf("anjuke.test") >= 0;
    }
    var gLogin = new XF.Login({
        loginST: '#j-site-login',
        pathUrl : "/ajax/checkMenu/",
        baseUrl: isTestEnv() ? '//user.anjuke.test' : '//user.anjuke.com'
    });

    var is_58_pc = false;
    var XF_Search = new XF.Search({
        searchST  : '#j-search',
        formST    : '.search-form',
        inputST   : '.input-search',
        listST    : '.search-autocomplete',
        searchBtn  : '#search-btn',
        hoverClass: 'hover',
        initVal   : '请输入楼盘名或地址',
        url       : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/autocomplete/',
        brand_url : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/brand/',
        t         : 6,
        c         : 115,
        n         : 8,
        p         : '',//shangzhu , shangpu , xiezilou
        wcs_search: '1',
        type      : 3,//tw和pc端接口统一，区分来源 pc=3, tw=2,
        is58PC    : is_58_pc,
        is_commercial : 0,
        soj:'{"click_input":"{from:search_box_click}"}',
        has_rent: '0'
    });

    var XF_HotSearch = new XF.HotSearch({
        gSearch  : XF_Search,
        hSearchST: '#j-hot-search',
        hoverClass: 'current',
    });

    new XF.NewFilter.tabShow({
        have_select: [] || {},
        base_url: 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/loupan',
        parms_url: '/loupan/',

    (function($) {
        var base64CurrentUrl = "aHR0cDovL255LmZhbmcuYW5qdWtlLmNvbS9sb3VwYW4vYWxsL3AzLw==";
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var href;
            if (base64CurrentUrl) {
                $("body").on("click.logout", "a", function(e) {
                    var elm = $(this);
                    if (elm.html() == "退出" && (href = elm.attr("href"))) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        window.location.href = href + (href.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?") + "history=" + base64CurrentUrl;
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    })(jQuery);

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤

        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节

<script type="text/template" id="market-result-tpl">
  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>
    <div class="fail-wrap">
      <div class="fail-title"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.title %></div>
      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>
            <div class="coupon-value"><%= marketResult.styleContent.discountValue + marketResult.styleContent.unit %></div>
          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <div class="expire-date"><%= '有效期：' + marketResult.styleContent.startTime + '~' + marketResult.styleContent.endTime %></div>
        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

    function isTestEnv() {
        return ("" + window.location.host).indexOf("anjuke.test") >= 0;
    }
    var gLogin = new XF.Login({
        loginST: '#j-site-login',
        pathUrl : "/ajax/checkMenu/",

    });

    ;
    (function($) {
        var base64CurrentUrl = "aHR0cDovL255LmZhbmcuYW5qdWtlLmNvbS9sb3VwYW4vYWxsL3A0Lw==";
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var href;
            if (base64CurrentUrl) {
                $("body").on("click.logout", "a", function(e) {
                    var elm = $(this);
                    if (elm.html() == "退出" && (href = elm.attr("href"))) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        window.location.href = href + (href.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?") + "history=" + base64CurrentUrl;
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    })(jQuery);

    var captcha = ISDCaptcha({
        'element' : 'ISDCaptcha',
        'width' : 280,//宽度
        'type' : 340,//验证码级别
        'showType'   : 'embed', //  ['embed', 'trigger', 'win']//如果不传此值，默认为嵌入式.embed：嵌入式.trigger：触发式.win:弹出式
        'sessionId' : '0095366f5cd14866b72a0673370695cb',
        'targetElm':'submit',//只对弹出式有效,如果是根据后端策略确定是否为弹出时
        //'winAutoShow':true,//弹出式时添加此属性会自动弹出,默认为false,不自动弹出
        'successCallback' : function successCallback(data) {
            document.getElementById("successToken").value = data.successToken;
            document.getElementById("captchaForm").submit();
        },
        'failCallback' : function failCallback(data) {
        }
    })
    captcha.init();

    function check_code(){
        $("error_msg").innerHTML = '';
        var code = $('').value;
        if(code == ''){
            $("error_msg").innerHTML ='验证码必须填写';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤
        原始皮肤为 topicactive01 对应 安居客赢了网
        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节

<script type="text/template" id="market-result-tpl">
  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>
    <div class="fail-wrap">
      <div class="fail-title"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.title %></div>
      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>
            <div class="coupon-value"><%= marketResult.styleContent.discountValue + marketResult.styleContent.unit %></div>
          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <div class="expire-date"><%= '有效期：' + marketResult.styleContent.startTime + '~' + marketResult.styleContent.endTime %></div>
        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

    //统一登录退出功能添加history
    ;
    (function($) {
        var base64CurrentUrl = "aHR0cDovL255LmZhbmcuYW5qdWtlLmNvbS9sb3VwYW4vYWxsL3A1Lw==";
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var href;
            if (base64CurrentUrl) {
                $("body").on("click.logout", "a", function(e) {
                    var elm = $(this);
                    if (elm.html() == "退出" && (href = elm.attr("href"))) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        window.location.href = href + (href.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?") + "history=" + base64CurrentUrl;
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    })(jQuery);

<script type="text/javascript">
    ;(function() {

    var captcha = ISDCaptcha({

        'sessionId' : 'e1a2caba55a84077a6def6a042ab9581',
        'targetElm':'submit',//只对弹出式有效,如果是根据后端策略确定是否为弹出时
        //'winAutoShow':true,//弹出式时添加此属性会自动弹出,默认为false,不自动弹出
        'successCallback' : function successCallback(data) {
            document.getElementById("successToken").value = data.successToken;
            document.getElementById("captchaForm").submit();
        },
        'failCallback' : function failCallback(data) {
        }
    })
    captcha.init();

    function check_code(){
        $("error_msg").innerHTML = '';
        var code = $('').value;
        if(code == ''){
            $("error_msg").innerHTML ='验证码必须填写';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>

        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤
        原始皮肤为 topicactive01 对应 安居客赢了网
        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节

<script type="text/template" id="market-result-tpl">
  <img width="352" height="426" src="<%= marketResult.image_url %>" />
  <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollFail) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2 ) { %>
    <div class="fail-wrap">
      <div class="fail-title"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.title %></div>
      <div class="fail-content"><%= marketResult.enrollFail.reason %></div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
  <% if (marketResult.status == 7 && !$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.enrollSuccess) && marketResult.enrollmentStyle == 2) { %>
    <div class="success-wrap">
      <div class="success-info">
        <div class="success-title"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.title %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <% if (marketResult.styleContent.discountValue > 0) { %>
            <div class="coupon-value"><%= marketResult.styleContent.discountValue + marketResult.styleContent.unit %></div>
          <% } %>
          <div class="success-content"><%= marketResult.styleContent.name %></div>
        <% } %>
      </div>
      <div class="success-intro">
        <div class="loupan-title"><%= '适用楼盘：' + marketResult.validLoupan %></div>
        <% if (!$.isEmptyObject(marketResult.styleContent)) { %>
          <div class="expire-date"><%= '有效期：' + marketResult.styleContent.startTime + '~' + marketResult.styleContent.endTime %></div>
        <% } %>
        <div class="remark-info"><%= marketResult.enrollSuccess.description %></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  <% } %>
</script>

    
    <!-- 统一登录弹层 -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="//pages.anjukestatic.com/xinfang/js/jquery-1.9.1/jquery-underscore.min.js"></script>


<script type="text/javascript" crossorigin src="https://include.anjukestatic.com/aifang/res/438350/b/Aifang_Web_Loupan_Listv4_ListIndex.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">


    function isTestEnv() {
        return ("" + window.location.host).indexOf("anjuke.test") >= 0;
    }
    var gLogin = new XF.Login({
        loginST: '#j-site-login',
        pathUrl : "/ajax/checkMenu/",
        baseUrl: isTestEnv() ? '//user.anjuke.test' : '//user.anjuke.com'
    });

    var is_58_pc = false;
    var XF_Search = new XF.Search({
        searchST  : '#j-search',
        formST    : '.search-form',
        inputST   : '.input-search',
        listST    : '.search-autocomplete',
        searchBtn  : '#search-btn',
        hoverClass: 'hover',
        initVal   : '请输入楼盘名或地址',
        url       : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/autocomplete/',
        brand_url : 'https://ny.fang.anjuke.com/a/brand/',
        t         : 6,
        c         : 115,
        n         : 8,
        p         : '',//shangzhu , shangpu , xiezilou
        wcs_search: '1',
        type      : 3,//tw和pc端接口统一，区分来源 pc=3, tw=2,
        is58PC    : is_58_pc,
        is_commercial : 0,
        soj:'{"click_input":"{from:search_box_click}"}',

    (function($) {
        var base64CurrentUrl = "aHR0cDovL255LmZhbmcuYW5qdWtlLmNvbS9sb3VwYW4vYWxsL3A2Lw==";
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var href;
            if (base64CurrentUrl) {
                $("body").on("click.logout", "a", function(e) {
                    var elm = $(this);
                    if (elm.html() == "退出" && (href = elm.attr("href"))) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        window.location.href = href + (href.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?") + "history=" + base64CurrentUrl;
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    })(jQuery);

    var captcha = ISDCaptcha({
        'element' : 'ISDCaptcha',
        'width' : 280,//宽度
        'type' : 340,//验证码级别
        'showType'   : 'embed', //  ['embed', 'trigger', 'win']//如果不传此值，默认为嵌入式.embed：嵌入式.trigger：触发式.win:弹出式
        'sessionId' : '03a4bd2f34534e4d991cbf46d3bf7697',
        'targetElm':'submit',//只对弹出式有效,如果是根据后端策略确定是否为弹出时
        //'winAutoShow':true,//弹出式时添加此属性会自动弹出,默认为false,不自动弹出
        'successCallback' : function successCallback(data) {
            document.getElementById("successToken").value = data.successToken;
            document.getElementById("captchaForm").submit();
        },
        'failCallback' : function failCallback(data) {
        }
    })
    captcha.init();

    function check_code(){
        $("error_msg").innerHTML = '';
        var code = $('').value;
        if(code == ''){
            $("error_msg").innerHTML ='验证码必须填写';
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var anjuke_web_global_InitTracker=function(city_id,city_cookie_name,guid_cookie_name,base_domain,cookie_path){
        var expire=365*5;
        var guid=this.getCookie(guid_cookie_name);
        if(null==guid){
            guid=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }else{
            this.setCookie(guid_cookie_name,guid,expire+1,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        if(city_id!=this.getCookie(city_cookie_name)){
            this.setCookie(city_cookie_name,city_id,expire,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        var session_cookie_name='sessid';var session_id=this.getCookie(session_cookie_name);if(null==session_id){
            session_id=this.createGuid();this.setCookie(session_cookie_name,session_id,0,cookie_path,base_domain);
        }
        this.setCookie('isp', 'true', expire, cookie_path, base_domain);
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.createGuid=function(){
        return(this.S4()+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+"-"+this.S4()+this.S4()+this.S4());
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.S4=function(){
        return(((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1).toUpperCase();
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.getCookie=function(check_name){
        var a_all_cookies=document.cookie.split(';');var a_temp_cookie='';var cookie_name='';var cookie_value='';var b_cookie_found=false;for(i=0;i<a_all_cookies.length;i++){
            a_temp_cookie=a_all_cookies[i].split('=');cookie_name=a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');if(cookie_name==check_name){
                b_cookie_found=true;if(a_temp_cookie.length>1){
                    cookie_value=unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,''));
                }
                return cookie_value;break;
            }
            a_temp_cookie=null;cookie_name='';
        }
        if(!b_cookie_found){
            return null;
        }
    };anjuke_web_global_InitTracker.prototype.setCookie=function(name,value,expires,path,domain,secure){
        var today=new Date();today.setTime(today.getTime());if(expires){
            expires=expires*1000*60*60*24;
        }
        var expires_date=new Date(today.getTime()+(expires));document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+
            ((expires)?";expires="+expires_date.toGMTString():"")+
            ((path)?";path="+path:"")+
            ((domain)?";domain="+domain:"")+
            ((secure)?";secure":"");
    };
    new anjuke_web_global_InitTracker('115','ctid','aQQ_ajkguid','anjuke.com','/');
</script>
<!-- INIT END --></head>

            </div>
        </div>
    	 <!--  region-item End -->

    <!-- 因为逻辑不变
        Aifang_Web_Loupan_List_ListIndexv2_BottomMask 相当于加一套皮肤
        原始皮肤为 topicactive01 对应 安居客赢了网
        新皮肤为 topicactive02 对应 安居客周周看房活动
        新新皮肤为 topicactive03 对应 七夕情人节看房活动
        新新新皮肤为 topicactive04 对应 奥运看房活动
        新新新新皮肤为 topicactive05 对应 58神奇节
        新新新新新皮肤为 topicactive06 对应 2017挑房节
    -->

  <% } %>
</script>

                });

        });
    })(jQuery);
